Publish.LongDescription:
## Custom decal asset to customize subway stations
## YOU CAN WATCH THE YOUTUBE VIDEO LINKED TO UNDERSTAND HOW TO USE IT. ## PLEASE PLACE ALL ASSETS USING ANARCHY, OTHERWISE THEY WILL DISAPPEAR.
# How to use it 1. For placing the assets, you need to disable Snap upright in the snapping options. 2. Add the station name decal on top of the Station Sign. There are names in english and brazilian portuguese. 3. Add relevant icons for the lines available in that station. For custom stations with multiple entrances, I recommend the Modular Subway Station Assets Pack. 4. For the subway map, place a Screen asset and after that place the Metro Sao Paulo Screen Poster on top of it.
# Using maps and screens Metro Next Train Screen -> Healthcare Logo Wall Medium. Metro Sao Paulo Screen Poster -> Screen01 - ADDAD_AdAdvertiseHere (DO NOT USE THE SCREEN 01 WITHOUT AD. YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO PLACE THE POSTER)
#### All of the lines names, colors and icons are based in the Sao Paulo Metro in Brazil.
